article_title: Employees Get Apple Watch for $25 (But There’s a Catch)
article_text:
Employees at a handful of companies will soon get a sweet deal: an Apple Watch for just $25.

But there is a catch—they must meet monthly fitness goals over two years or pay the full price.

The deal, offered through the Vitality Group, a health-services firm, is the latest attempt by employers and wellness firms to spur workers to move...
